title: Lightweaver

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At day, broadcast a light in the view of three different players. During the night, each of them can choose to **reach out** to the light, silently - giving no notification - roleblocking the other two targets. You'll know who reaches out and who does not. You can't target fellow Parties with this ability. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If all three of your targets try **reaching out**, no one will be roleblocked and you can instead choose one of the three targets to deal an Unstoppable attack to during the day. You'll also be able to revive one extra person at the end of the game.
- If none of your targets attempt to reach out, your defense will be set to Vulnerable for the next night.
- You have roleblock immunity.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Unite the Town under at least one sun.

desc:
Post 2469
*The sun alone can **nourish** us all. There's no need for any other sustenance.*
